'''13w41b''' is the eleventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.7.2]], released on October 11, 2013<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.mojang.com/2013/10/minecraft-snapshot-13w41a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 13w41b (Updated!)|author=Dinnerbone|date=October 11, 2013|website=Mojang.com}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs in the [[13w41a]] snapshot.

13w41b was reuploaded later in that day, to fix crashes related to the server icon.<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|388686645295595520|... Stealth fix for crashes with server icon has been uploaded. Restart your client if you had that!|11 Oct 13}}</ref></onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* [[13w41a]] has the same protocol version as 13w41b, but they are not compatible with each other.
* 13w41b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
